items.title: Thanksgiving Doorbuster at 50% off: Lexar’s 2TB metal portable SSD with built-in carabiner loop at $100
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Black Friday sale, and joining the Thanksgiving Deals of the Day offer on a 24GB Mac mini at $150 off, B&H has listed Lexar’s 2TB SL600 portable SSD for $99.99 shipped with a $25 on-page coupon that auto-applies during checkout. This drive typically goes for $200 and rarely sees discounts, but it’s 50% off today – even better than the B&H early Black Friday deal we saw last week. While this 2TB variant is also discounted at other retailers, the B&H Thanksgiving Doorbuster delivers an additional discount to mark a new best price to beat. The 1TB variant of this is also down to $74.99 shipped, which is also a touch lower than what we saw it fetching last week. This portable drive has a unique design with a built-in carabiner loop, similar to Samsung’s T5 EVO model, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.title: What stores are open on Thanksgiving Day 2025? Holiday hours for Walmart, Best Buy, Costco, Target, more
items.summary:
Is Walmart open today? Is Best Buy closed for Thanksgiving this year? What about Target and Home Depot? There are several major retail locations that will be closed for Thanksgiving Day 2025 so you’ll want to quickly take a look at the list below before making any plans. Whether you’re looking to pick up some goodies for your Thanksgiving festivities, or just have some time to kill on your day off today, options will be limited when it comes to the major national chains, but it is always a good idea to call ahead just in case. There are some small more local chains and shops that will open today for some last-minute grabs, but by and large most big box stores and warehouses are closed down for Thanksgiving Day. Check out the details we have gathered down below for a closer look.

items.title: One of the best Black Friday 2025 gaming monitor deals: AOC’s 27-inch QD-OLED 240Hz display at $370 all-time low
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Black Friday sale, Best Buy is offering one of AOC’s 27-inch QD-OLED QHD 240Hz gaming monitors down at $369.99 shipped. This is regularly a $550 model, which is now seeing a solid $180 discount. It dropped to the $400 mark last month during the fall Prime Day sale, but today’s Black Friday offer steps it up with an additional $30 discount. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this gaming display, and it’s also one of the best prices we have tracked for a QD-OLED gaming monitor yet, as these displays typically cost close to $1,000, like this wildly popular Alienware QD-OLED monitor that’s currently going for $699.99 shipped after a $200 discount. Also, a similarly-specced AOC model with a different part number is currently fetching $399.99 shipped at Amazon, making Best Buy’s a touch better in terms of the overall value. Head below for more details.

Microfiber cleaning cloths are a staple in my home. They’re wonderful for cleaning and soaking up messes. At only $0.23 each, it’s hard to go wrong here. Reach for these instead of paper towels and you’ll save big over time.

Regularly $190 and very rarely ever on sale since it first landed on Amazon earlier this year, you can now land one starting from under $138 shipped for Black Friday.

items.title: Aiper’s Black Friday Sale offers up to 50% savings on robot pool cleaners, skimmers, monitors, more from $120
items.summary:
As part of the Black Friday Week Sale at Amazon, Aiper’s official storefront is offering up to 50% discounts across its robot pool cleaners and smart devices, including the popular Surfer S2 Solar Robotic Pool Skimmer at $319.99 shipped. More recently, fetching $360 at full price (over the former $400 MSRP), we’ve seen discounts keeping costs above $340 since the start of August, with these Black Friday savings being the biggest discount during the past four months. The price is ending up only $20 above the low that has only happened once back during July’s Prime Day event. Head below for a complete lineup of all the other Black Friday deals we’re seeing from this brand.

items.title: OpenAI claims teen circumvented safety features before suicide that ChatGPT helped plan
items.summary: In August, parents Matthew and Maria Raine sued OpenAI and its CEO, Sam Altman, over their 16-year-old son Adam's suicide, accusing the company of wrongful death.
